full_summary:
## Skylight Metal Cladding Replacement
### Bid Invitation
#### Invitation to Bid: EP807-230706/A

Project Description:
Replace metal cladding, trim, and sealant on the roof skylight at the Bank of Nova Scotia building.

**Duration of the Contract:** 8 weeks

**Bid Submission:**

• Interested suppliers may submit a bid
• Bid documents can be obtained via [Buyandsell.gc.ca/tenders](http://Buyandsell.gc.ca/tenders) or [1-855-886-3030](tel:1-855-886-3030)
• Sealed bids will be received at: Public Works and Government Services Canada, Bid Receiving Unit, Place du Portage, Phase III, Main Lobby Core 0B2, 11 Laurier Street, Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 1C9

**Clauses of Participation:**

#### Mandatory Security Requirements:
• Hold a valid SITE ACCESS Clearance, granted or approved by the Contract Security Program (CSP), Public Works and Government Services (PWGSC)

#### Access Visits:
Two site visits were conducted on:
1. **23/09/2022**: Interested bidders attended the mandatory site visit.
2. **01/11/2022**: An additional site visit was held.

#### Enquiries:
Enquiries can be submitted to Mike Stirling by email at [mike.stirling@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:mike.stirling@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca). Last submission date for ENQUIRIES is five (3) business days prior to the closing date.

#### Contract Document:
Contract documents are available on [Buyandsell.gc.ca/tenders](http://Buyandsell.gc.ca/tenders)

#### Submission Payments:
Purchases are to be made in accordance with the provided documents. Please consult [Buyandsell.gc.ca/tenders](http://Buyandsell.gc.ca/tenders) for queries.

**Security:**
Entrants comply with the Security Requirements Check List and security guide attached to Annex A.

### Important Details:

* **Trade Agreement:** CFTA and CTPP
* **Closing Time and Date:** November 21, 2022, at 2:00 p.m.
* **delivery date:** September 13, 2022
* Files are available at the home page to view supporting documents
